评论概述: Stiff as a board and zipper got stuck and broke....Twice
评论详情: After only 6 weeks, the zipper got stuck on the jacket material that covers the zipper. (See pic) This is the second Eisenhower jacket that this has happened to. I could not get the zipper unstuck without pulling hard. The zipper ended up breaking just like on the last Eisenhower jacket owned. 6 weeks old and the jacket goes in the trash just like the last one. Do not buy this jacket. Defective design causes zipper to get stuck. You're welcome

评论概述: I want to love it but a few things holding it back
评论详情: It needs a higher cotton blend count... imagine the material of a baseball cap against your skin  If you're wearing this with a tank top it's going to feel scratchy  I live in Southern California so to get around the hot weather I'll wear this no shirt underneath  Forget sleeping in it  I would consider using some rit color remover and boiling it to see if it softens  Or then dying it again with boiling water to try  Otherwise idk I wish there was an inside pocket  And the sleeves are long whilst body is short  I'm 5'7" and bought size small I had to get sleeves tailored  I'm looking online and see Levi's has a similar jacket all cotton  Really considering trying it

评论概述: Roll Up Your Sleeves And Go To Work
评论详情: I recently picked up this Dickies Eisenhower jacket for the coming autumn season and I really like it. It’s made of a sturdy polyester and cotton blend which makes it lightweight but heavy enough for somewhat bad weather. I would suggest that if you’d like to get a more slim, tapered look, size down. This may also help with the length of the sleeves. I’m 5’11”, 205 lbs. I typically wear a Large jacket (42” chest) but for some reason, the sleeves run long. Other than that, this work jacket is business up front and a party in the back.

评论概述: CLASSIC STYLING + PERFECT FIT for my DAD BOD!!
评论详情: Guys, I gained some weight in my mid-section and I don't have the "V" shape required of me by so many brands. I'm so glad that brands like Dickies and Carhartt don't assume that some some Adonis-looking contestant on the "Bachelor" franchise. I'm a regular-looking 45 year old dude. And this jacket is 100% EXACTLY what I wanted it to be. I also love how the color looks great with my jeans (I bought this jacket in Navy & Black so I could alternate, depending on what color jeans I was am wearing), and it looks perfect. In fact, I look way better than "a regular-looking 45 year old dude" now. Like, I actually look ... good! Rugged construction and classic styling; I've been a fan of Dickies brand stuff since I was a teenager (back in the LAST CENTURY). I really apprectaie the pricepoint, too (unlike Carhartt, which can be stupid-expensive.). This is one of several Dickies items I bought recently and I am really psyched.

评论详情: Great light jacket....big inside pockets...great for everyday wear !!!!!

Not up to standard

Iv been buying this jacket for 15 years. I love this jacket! It is as thin as a shirt but looks good and has pockets and a collar.  In the colder weather you can wear a sweatshirt underneath with a hood. This jacket is great for everyday wear. Is sturdy as heck and lasts years even with many washes. The jacket obviously becomes softer with a little wear whereas its quite stiff at first. Oh I totally recommend this jacket! Its great for patches too. The lined Eisenhower jacket is great as well for colder weather Like under 60' ish. I wear the thin jacket all through spring , fall and summer and the lined during the winter. If you have never worn one of these jackets I totally say, Dickies is cool! From skater wear to rockabilly and punk or metal workers , whatever your style or work I highly recommend it because it will last you years and is totally worth the money. The only downfall is there aren't enough pockets, inside pockets would be better i think. Although there is a 'kind-of' inside pocket it isn't sewn to be a proper pocket. Overall yay Dickies Iv been wearing you for 30 years!!

评论概述: No longer a $50 jacket, it's worth $30, tops.
评论详情: The sleeves are too long. The cuffs are too big and not adjustable. The seems are poorly done. Your product description says the black jacket is 100% cotton, but the label says 65% poly. Dickies are no longer a quality product for working adults, they are now made for skateboarding teenagers. The quality isn't there anymore, this jacket goes back..

评论概述: Durable Jacket glad I ordered it!
评论详情: Fits good and will last for years to come!

I had a medium Eisenhower Jacket sent to me at first. It was a little bigger than I thought. Tried to exchange for a smaller size and was sent a leather jacket from a brand I never heard of. But I will review the one I returned for the sake of a review. It actually felt like a good coat. Comfortable and nice strong zipper. The pockets were large and deep enough for whatever you need as well as inside pockets in the same area as the outside but smaller. Nice all around coat. If I fit that size, I would have kept it.  So for a rating of the actual Eisenhower Jacket, I give it a 4 out of 5 stars.

He (Jake) looks super hot in this jacket. Warm enough for work but doesn't make him sweat. Can wear it out for drinks after. Day to night, baby! Looks great on our bedroom floor if you know what I mean. *nudge nudge, grin grin, say n'more*

Jacket was not what I had expected. I thought the jacket would have been thinner and able to be worn as a windbreaker.  This jacket material is thick and could be worn as a fall/winter jacket. Size wise, the fit was pretty good and I can wear this jacket when the weather gets colder.

评论概述: Perfect for cool days down to 45F.
评论详情: Good material. Windproof and water resistant. Zipper hangs a bit near the bottom.

Wear it on the job, abuse it, toss it in the washer when you get home, and feel comfortable wearing it out on the town casual-style. Truly well made and doubtful it can be worn out or destroyed, unless you slid down the freeway at 60mph after ditching a motorcycle. It could happen. But rest assured in its normal life span, its going to weather whatever you throw at it. Deep pockets, especially the four inside, industrial zipper, and stitching that is crazy strong. Sleeves are a bit long, but I do yave short, stocky arms. One fold up on cuff and voila!
I like it! Fits well. I have been looking for one like this for years- never knew the style was called "Eisenhower" jacket.
Love it
Perfect for my needs.

This is not the same material as the lines jacket. Whatever it is made out of attracts lint like you won't believe and it is stiff scratchy material. Very uncomfortable. I thought it would be a good option for days that weren't cold but an extremely light jacket would be nice. Not the case, total failure on dickies part.

The material was stiff and rough, and had no inner lining. When claiming it was not insulated, I at least expected that it would have some sort of heat-neutral lining inside.  I put it on and felt like I was draping an art canvas over my shoulders. It was big and baggy all the way around, and didn't conform at all to my very average shape. It took about 5 seconds to decide I didn't like it.  Overall disappointed. Returned it immediately.

This is a wonderful coat. Has a broad chest and nice length arms. The jacket length comes right to my belt line. I'm 6'3" and, normally, I try to get a "tall" version, but one was not available. Guess I'll have to start tucking my shirts in. Great look and great quality!
